overview: In Private’s Double Lives nothing is as it seems! Sexy Alexis Crystal is lonely and jealous of the lives of her glamorous co-workers who appear to have everything worked out with their loving partners and healthy relationships… Little does she know that all of these girls have naughty secrets and hungering desires! Whether you’re a slutty secretary like Barbara Bieber, a swinging wife like Blanche Bradburry, or a model / call girl like Vanessa Decker, one thing all these girls have in common is a love for big hard cock and if you have money you can have Belle Claire and Sarah Kay anyway you want them! Nothing gets these shallow sluts wetter than seeing a shiny new sports car but behind the glitz and the glamour lies one thing, a burning desire for hardcore sex!
title: Double Lives
